value.desc: Model of the component defining current stepper's name; If used as Number, it does not define stepper index though but stepper names which may be an Integer; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

animated.desc: Enable transitions between steps (also see 'transition-prev' and 'transition-next' props)

infinite.desc: Makes Stepper appear as infinite (when reaching last step, next one will become the first one)

swipeable.desc: Enable swipe events (may interfere with content's touch/mouse events)

transition-prev.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

transition-next.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

vertical.desc: Set Stepper as vertical instead of default horizontal.

alternative-labels.desc: Use alternative labels (applies only to horizontal stepper).

header-nav.desc: Set the ability to navigate to previous steps through header.

contractable.desc: Labels are hidden on narrow windows.

stepName.desc: Step's name, which may be a String or Number; me, which may be a String or Number; Number does not refer to step index, but to its name, which may be an Integer
